select zai.account_id, zai.telphone, zai.password, zai.nick_name, zai.user_head, zai.account_source, zai.created_time, zai.updated_time, zai.status, zai.is_deleted, zagi.agent_type, zagi.real_name, zagi.idno, zagi.status as check_status, (SELECT zsi.real_name FROM zh_account_verify_log zavl inner join zh_staff_info zsi on zavl.created_by=zsi.staff_id WHERE zavl.target_id = #{accountId} and target_type=#{targetType} ORDER BY zavl.created_time DESC LIMIT 1) as check_by from zh_account_info zai left join zh_agent_info zagi on zai.account_id=zagi.account_id and zagi.is_deleted = #{isDeleted} where zai.account_id = #{accountId} and zai.is_deleted = #{isDeleted}
